spaska.analysis

Interface IAnalyzer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Parametrable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CrossValidation

    public interface IAnalyzer
extends Parametrable
    An interface that represents all analyzers that can test the performance of a given classifier or other characteristics.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ClassifierStatistics analyze(Dataset testSet)
      Analyze the classifier that was set on the given dataset.
      IClassifier getClassifier()
      Get the classifier that will be analysed.
      void setClassifier(IClassifier classifier)
      Set the classifier that will be analysed.

        setParameters

    • Method Detail

      • getClassifier

        IClassifier getClassifier()
        Get the classifier that will be analysed.
        Returns:
        the classifier that was bound to this analyzer.

        Set the classifier that will be analysed.
        Parameters:
        classifier - the classifier that will be analysed

      • analyze

        ClassifierStatistics analyze(Dataset testSet)
        Analyze the classifier that was set on the given dataset.
        Parameters:
        testSet - the dataset on which to analyze the classifier
        Returns:
        the result from the analysis
